metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13306 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8and 13.3.4. GitLab Webhook feature could be abused to perform denial ofservice attacks due to the lack of rate limitation.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
